item.title: Melissa add a quote by Adeline Yen Mah
item.description: "Please believe that one single positive dream is more important than a thousand negative realities." -- Adeline Yen Mah

item.title: Melissa add a quote by Adeline Yen Mah
item.description: "I read because I have to. It drives everything else from my mind. It lets me escape to find other world." -- Adeline Yen Mah

item.title: Melissa add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "And, when you want something, all the universe conspires in helping you to achieve it." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Melissa add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "It's the possibility of having a dream come true that makes life interesting." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Melissa add a quote by Wendelin Van Draanen
item.description: "Some of us get dipped in flat, some in satin, some in gloss...." He turned to me. "But every once in a while, you find someone who's iridescent, and when you do, nothing will ever compare." -- Wendelin Van Draanen

item.title: Melissa add a quote by Wendelin Van Draanen
item.description: "...Next time you're faced with a choice, do the right thing. It hurts everyone less in the long run." -- Wendelin Van Draanen

item.title: Melissa add a quote by Judy Blume
item.description: "Are you there God? It's me, Margaret." -- Judy Blume

item.title: Melissa add a quote by Wendelin Van Draanen
item.description: "Get beyond his eyes and his smile and the sheen of his hair -- Look at what's really there." -- Wendelin Van Draanen

item.title: Melissa add a quote by Wendelin Van Draanen
item.description: "You can't dwell on what might have been...and it's not fair to condemn him for something he hasn't done." -- Wendelin Van Draanen

item.title: Melissa add a quote by Wendelin Van Draanen
item.description:
"I had Flipped.
-Bryce Loski" -- Wendelin Van Draanen

item.title: Melissa add a quote by Khaled Hosseini
item.description: "It may be unfair, but what happens in a few days, sometimes even a single day, can change the course of a whole lifetime..." -- Khaled Hosseini

item.title: Melissa add a quote by Khaled Hosseini
item.description: "For you, a thousand times over" -- Khaled Hosseini

item.title: Melissa add a quote by Khaled Hosseini
item.description: "There is only one sin. and that is theft... when you tell a lie, you steal someones right to the truth." -- Khaled Hosseini

item.title: Melissa add a quote by Khaled Hosseini
item.description: "And that's the thing about people who mean everything they say. They think everyone else does too." -- Khaled Hosseini

item.title: Melissa add a quote by Khaled Hosseini
item.description: "it always hurts more to have and lose than to not have in the first place." -- Khaled Hosseini

item.title: Melissa add a quote by Khaled Hosseini
item.description: "It was only a smile, nothing more. It didn't make everything all right. It didn't make ANYTHING all right. Only a smile. A tiny thing. A leaf in the woods, shaking in the wake of a startled bird's flight. But I'll take it. With open arms. Because when spring comes, it melts the snow one flake at a time, and maybe I just witnessed the first flake melting. - Amir" -- Khaled Hosseini

item.title: Melissa add a quote by Khaled Hosseini
item.description: "There are a lot of children in Afghanistan, but little childhood." -- Khaled Hosseini

item.title: Melissa add a quote by Khaled Hosseini
item.description: "Not a word passes between us, not because we have nothing to say, but because we don't have to say anything" -- Khaled Hosseini

item.title: Melissa add a quote by Khaled Hosseini
item.description: "One time, when I was very little, I climbed a tree and ate these green, sour apples. My stomach swelled and became hard like a drum, it hurt a lot. Mother said that if I'd just waited for the apples to ripen, I wouldn't have become sick. So now, whenever I really want something, I try to remember what she said about the apples." -- Khaled Hosseini

item.title: Melissa add a quote by Khaled Hosseini
item.description: "War doesn't negate decency. It demands it, even more than in times of peace." - Baba" -- Khaled Hosseini

item.title: Melissa add a quote by Khaled Hosseini
item.description: "and every day I thank [God] that I am alive, not because I fear death, but because my wife has a husband and my son is not an orphan." -- Khaled Hosseini

item.title: Melissa add a quote by Khaled Hosseini
item.description: "You've always been a tourist here. You just didn't know it." -- Khaled Hosseini

item.title: Melissa add a quote by Khaled Hosseini
item.description: "some stories don't need telling" -- Khaled Hosseini

item.title: Melissa add a quote by Khaled Hosseini
item.description: "I'm so afraid. Because I'm so profoundly happy. Happiness like this is frightening...They only let you this happy if they're preparing to take something from you." -- Khaled Hosseini

item.title: Melissa add a quote by Khaled Hosseini
item.description: "Yes, hope is a strange thing. Peace at last. But at what price?" -- Khaled Hosseini

item.title: Melissa add a quote by Khaled Hosseini
item.description: "It is now your duty to hone that talent, because a person who wastes his God-given talents is a donkey." -- Khaled Hosseini

item.title: Melissa add a quote by Khaled Hosseini
item.description: "And suddenly, just like that, hope became knowledge. I was going to win. It was just a matter of when." -- Khaled Hosseini

item.title: Melissa add a quote by Khaled Hosseini
item.description: "Marriage can wait, education cannot." -- Khaled Hosseini

item.title: Melissa add a quote by Khaled Hosseini
item.description: "A society has no chance of success if its women are uneducated..." -- Khaled Hosseini

item.title: Melissa add a quote by Khaled Hosseini
item.description: "Behind every trial and sorrow that He makes us shoulder, God has a reason." -- Khaled Hosseini
